thread.title: Russian police foil 'terror attack' planned on Moscow
thread.title_full: Russian police foil 'terror attack' planned on Moscow | News24

author: news24.com
title: Russian police foil 'terror attack' planned on Moscow
text:
Moscow - Russian police have arrested a group of people they said were planning a terror attack on Moscow, the country's anti-terrorism committee said on Sunday, without giving details about the group's motives.
"After a series of investigations by the security services, a group of individuals was arrested in the west of Moscow suspected of planning a terrorist attack on the capital," the committee was Quote: d by local media as saying.
Investigators found about 4kg of homemade explosives in the suspects' apartment, the official TASS news agency reported.
More than 120 people were evacuated from the building and the explosives were defused.
